Room.Name: Frodorab's Fine Boots and Shoes
Room.ShortDescription: This is the bootery of Frodorab, the finest shoemaker in the village.
Room.LongDescription: Hobbits have long been known for their craftsmanship with shoes and tools, and Frodorab is one of the best. He makes boots and shoes of all sizes, for any race. If you have seven toes or three, he can make the shoe fit.
